concepts.GREATER_THAN_3_MONTHS_PRESENCE_OF_KIDNEY: Greater than 3 Months Presence Of Kidney Damage
concepts.CHRONIC_KIDNEY_DISEASE,_CORTICAL_SCARRIN: Cortical scarring due to infarcts, pyelonephritis or vesicoureteral reflux
concepts.CHRONIC_KIDNEY_DISEASE,_SMALL_AND_ECHOGE: Small and echogenic kidneys (common in later stages of CKD due to many parenchymal diseases)
concepts.CHRONIC_KIDNEY_DISEASE,_LIKELY_CAUSE_OF_:
- Glomerular diseases (diabetes, autoimmune diseases, systemic infections, drugs, neoplasia).
- Vascular diseases (atherosclerosis, hypertension, ischemia, vasculitis, thrombotic microangiopathy).
- Tubulointerstitial diseases (urinary tract infections, stones, obstruction, drug toxicity).
- Cystic disease (polycystic kidney disease).
concepts.CHRONIC_KIDNEY_DISEASE,_RENAL_MASSES_18_: Renal masses or enlarged kidneys due to infiltrative diseases
concepts.CHRONIC_KIDNEY_DISEASE,_DIAGNOSTIC_CRITE:
- Greater than 3 months presence of kidney damage (usually detected as urinary albumin excretion of more than 30 mg/day, or equivalent)
- decreased kidney function (defined as estimated glomerular filtration rate [eGFR] less than 60 mL/min per 1.73 m2)
